title: Examples and counterexamples for magmas, semigroups and monoids

blocks.name: mgm2nsgrplem1
blocks.content: Lemma 1 for ~ mgm2nsgrp : ` M ` is a magma, even if ` A = B ` ( ` M ` is the trivial magma in this case, see ~ mgmb1mgm1 ). (Contributed by AV, 27-Jan-2020.)

thm mgm2nsgrplem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, cmgm))
  -| wceq(c5, cpr(c0, c2))
  -| wceq(cfv(cbs, c4), c5)
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c4), cmpo(s0, s1, c5, c5, cif(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cmgm), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  syl6eleqr(c0, c5, cpr(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  prid1g(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6eleqr(c2, c5, cpr(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c3))
  prid2g(c2, c3, c0)
  opifismgm(s0, s1, c4, c5, c2, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
  eqcomi(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5), wne(c5, emptycls))
  ne0i(c0, c5)
  simplr(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c5)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgm2nsgrplem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→ c4 ∈ Mgm)
  ⊣ c5 = { c0, c2 }
  ⊣ (Base ` c4)= c5
  ⊣ (+ ` c4)=(s0 ∈ c5, s1 ∈ c5 ↦ if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  syl2an(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ Mgm, c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  syl6eleqr(c0, c5, { c0, c2 }, c0 ∈ c1)
  prid1g(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6eleqr(c2, c5, { c0, c2 }, c2 ∈ c3)
  prid2g(c2, c3, c0)
  opifismgm(s0, s1, c4, c5, c2, c0, (c0 ∈ c5 ∧ c2 ∈ c5), (s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0))
  eqcomi(c5, (Base ` c4))
  adantr(c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5, c5 ≠ ∅)
  ne0i(c0, c5)
  simplr(c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5, (s0 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ∈ c5))
  simpll(c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5, (s0 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ∈ c5))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c5)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, c5)
}

  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)

  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c0), c4, c2), c0)), diffsc(s0, c6))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c0), c4, c2), c0), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  syl6eleqr(c0, c5, cpr(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  prid1g(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6eleqr(c2, c5, cpr(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c3))
  prid2g(c2, c3, c0)
  ovmpt2d(s0, s1, co(c0, c4, c0), c4, c2, c0, c5, c5, cif(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))), c5, wa(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)))
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cif(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))), c0))
  pm2.61i(wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cif(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))), c0)), wceq(c2, c0))
  a1d(wceq(c2, c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cif(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))), c0))
  syl6eq(cif(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))), c0, cif(c0, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))), wceq(c2, c0))
  ifeq1(c2, c0, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
  ifid(c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
  ex(wn(wceq(c2, c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cif(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))), c0))
  iffalsed(c2, c0, wa(wn(wceq(c2, c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
  intnand(wa(wn(wceq(c2, c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  biimpac(wn(wceq(c2, c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(c2, c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  bicomd(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(c2, c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  eqeq1(cv(s1), c2, c0)
  eqeltrd(co(c0, c4, c0), c5, c2, wa(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)))
  ovmpt2d(s0, s1, c0, c4, c0, c2, c5, c5, cif(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))), c5, wa(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)), wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c5, c5, cif(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))))))
  eqtri(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c5, c5, cif(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0)))), cfv(cplusg, c6))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cif(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))), c2))
  iftrue(c2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, c0)

  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))

thm mgm2nsgrplem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→((c0[c4]c0)[c4]c2)= c0)
  ⊣ c5 = { c0, c2 }
  ⊣ (Base ` c6)= c5
  ⊣ (+ ` c6)=(s0 ∈ c5, s1 ∈ c5 ↦ if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0))
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→((c0[c4]c0)[c4]c2)= c0), (Base ` c6)= c5)
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→((c0[c4]c0)[c4]c2)= c0), d(s0, c6))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, ((c0[c4]c0)[c4]c2)= c0, c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  syl6eleqr(c0, c5, { c0, c2 }, c0 ∈ c1)
  prid1g(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6eleqr(c2, c5, { c0, c2 }, c2 ∈ c3)
  prid2g(c2, c3, c0)
  ovmpt2d(s0, s1, (c0[c4]c0), c4, c2, c0, c5, c5, if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0), c5, (c0 ∈ c5 ∧ c2 ∈ c5))
  ad2antll((c0 ∈ c5 ∧ c2 ∈ c5), s0 =(c0[c4]c0), s1 = c2, if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0)= c0)
  pm2.61i((s1 = c2 → if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0)= c0), c2 = c0)
  a1d(c2 = c0, s1 = c2, if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0)= c0)
  syl6eq(if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0), c0, if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c0, c0), c2 = c0)
  ifeq1(c2, c0, c0, (s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0))
  ifid(c0, (s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0))
  ex(¬ c2 = c0, s1 = c2, if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0)= c0)
  iffalsed(c2, c0, (¬ c2 = c0 ∧ s1 = c2), (s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0))
  intnand((¬ c2 = c0 ∧ s1 = c2), s0 = c0, s1 = c0)
  biimpac(¬ c2 = c0, s1 = c2, ¬ s1 = c0)
  notbid(s1 = c2, c2 = c0, s1 = c0)
  bicomd(s1 = c2, c2 = c0, s1 = c0)
  eqeq1(s1, c2, c0)
  eqeltrd((c0[c4]c0), c5, c2, (c0 ∈ c5 ∧ c2 ∈ c5))
  ovmpt2d(s0, s1, c0, c4, c0, c2, c5, c5, if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0), c5, (c0 ∈ c5 ∧ c2 ∈ c5))
  a1i((c0 ∈ c5 ∧ c2 ∈ c5), c4 =(s0 ∈ c5, s1 ∈ c5 ↦ if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0)))
  eqtri(c4, (s0 ∈ c5, s1 ∈ c5 ↦ if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0)), (+ ` c6))
  adantl((c0 ∈ c5 ∧ c2 ∈ c5), (s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), if((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0), c2, c0)= c2)
  iftrue(c2, c0, (s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c0))
  simpr(c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  simpl(c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c5)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, c5)
}

blocks.name: mgm2nsgrplem4
blocks.content: Lemma 4 for ~ mgm2nsgrp : M is not a semigroup. (Contributed by AV, 28-Jan-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 31-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: sgrp2nmnd
blocks.content: A small semigroup (with two elements) which is not a monoid. (Contributed by AV, 26-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sgrp2nmnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wa(wcel(c1, csgrp), wnel(c1, cmnd)))
  -| wceq(c0, cpr(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), c0)
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c1), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c0, cif(c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  jca(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wcel(c1, csgrp), wnel(c1, cmnd))
  sgrp2nmndlem4(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  sgrp2nmndlem5(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sgrp2nmnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((# ` c0)= 2 →(c1 ∈ SGrp ∧ c1 ∉ Mnd))
  ⊣ c0 = { c2, c3 }
  ⊣ (Base ` c1)= c0
  ⊣ (+ ` c1)=(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0 ↦ if(s0 = c2, c2, c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  jca((# ` c0)= 2, c1 ∈ SGrp, c1 ∉ Mnd)
  sgrp2nmndlem4(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  sgrp2nmndlem5(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
}
